Test Name: Glial Fibrillary Acidic Protein (GFAP) Alpha Subunit Antibody, Immunofluorescence Titer Assay
Purpose: To detect and measure titers of GFAP alpha subunit antibodies in CSF for assessing neurologic disorders.
Equipment: Centrifuge, pipettes with tips, fluorescence microscope with appropriate filters, incubator, slide staining rack
